I told them this was a great opportunity for us to grow up. Allen Iverson 's doing what great players do. He's making other people better and he is taking responsibility and steps up. I feel good that a young team could respond this way. With Allen Iverson leading the way with 26 points, the Sixers built an 18-point lead by the 7:33 mark of the third quarter. Though many years have passed, the events of 1991 remain some of the defining and proudest of this old soldier's life, he said.`` To celebrate the victories of Operation Desert Storm is to celebrate the union of 34 allied nations joined by the recognition that unprovoked aggression against a peaceful nation will not be tolerated.''
